body_html:
Yes. Steps should be:

  1. Create a project in the API Dashboard
  2. Enable the Google Places API Web Service
  3. Create credentials (API Key)
  4. Restrict the API key for the respective URLS:
  5. (Optional) add another one for development:
  6. Verify you account by adding a credit card information
  7. Update keys in Repo and in the env vars on Heroku

This should be it, hope I did not forget something.

body: Yes. Steps should be: 1. Create a project in the [API Dashboard](https://console.developers.google.com/apis) 1. Enable the `Google Places API Web Service` 1. Create credentials (API Key) 1. Restrict the API key for the respective URLS: 1. (Optional) add another one for development: 1. Verify you account by adding a credit card information 1. Update keys in Repo and in the env vars on Heroku This should be it, hope I did not forget something.
